description: Reusable todo list component for coderef-dashboard with file system persistence

requirements.scope: Simple task list - basic add/remove/complete tasks
requirements.placement: Reusable component that can be imported anywhere
requirements.persistence: File system (JSON) - save to todos.json using existing file system API

notes: User wants a simple, reusable todo list component with file-based persistence. Should leverage existing file system API patterns from the dashboard.
